metadata.Title: CVE-2019-6342 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: An access bypass vulnerability exists when the experimental Workspaces module in Drupal 8 core is enabled. This can be mitigated by disabling the Workspaces module. It does not affect any release other than Drupal 8.7.4.

criterions.comment: drupal7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
